nodes.text: Qeruru'rr was a male Tusken Raider from the same clan as Reirin. He was a friend of hers, and unlike most of the rest of the clan had no problem with allowing women to fight. After Reirin ran away, she thought that although he understood her frustration with not being allowed to fight, he would not have spoken with her were she to return to the clan, because of her disappearance.
